Is the following statement true or false?

 

      When delivering the “WOW” to every guest, when working the bar you may be asked to:

 

        1.  Ensure that all furniture is clean and chairs are pushed straight up against the table or counter.

        2.  Check that the floor is free of debris.

        3.  Room temperature and entertainment sound levels are comfortable and appropriate.

        4.  Bar menus are clean and strategically placed.
